net: sched: sch: Fix off by one in htb_activate_prios()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.169 by commit c00867afe4efd5754e696d5c0a8d3f682efd7ffb, it was introduced in version v5.10.169 by commit 90fcf55d83b20da1091f926a291af05fb74f61c6. For more details please see the references link.
